full_threads.body:
Hi Sylvia, 

Hope you had a great weekend. Confirming that we have updated the new patient form. 

Here's the link:
https://www.livelyphysio.com.au/new-patient/

Let us know if you would like further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @heath please check it now if any need to update. @rica task 15min.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath.

Noticed a few things on the form on Android

- yes/no check boxes should be after the question (see attached)

- can you replace Studiopole with Motivated Mums. Remove GP/Specialist Name & Oyher podiatrist. Move Friends/Family down and create an answer box. And an answer box for Other too

Hope that makes sense.

Putting the link to the footer is a great idea. Thank you.

Regards,
Sylvia

Hi Sylvia,

Sure, confirming we have made these updates. 

Regarding where to link from, we can add the link to the footer of the website. This way it's easy to communicate to clients... "Head to our website and at the very bottom of the page you will see a button that says 'New Patient Form" Does that work for you? I have added one in the interim.

Hi Heath,

I just looked on the new patient form on desktop vs my samsung phone.

That box doesn't exist on the desktop version but does on android . ?

Also can you do a few things?
- put street name,suburb in address section
- remove other under email
- add a new section, How did you hear about us? have an answer box
- add another section, What is the name of your GP/Specialist? before the the question Do you give permission for us to communicate with your doctor?
- on the terms and conditions, Cancellation poplicy..Can you change the words from For physio and massage treatments the cancellation fee will be $45, .. to For physio and massage treatments the cancellation fee will be 50% of appointment cost

I hope that makes sense.

Regards,
Sylvia

Principal Physio, Director
Lively Physiotherapy & Pilates Studio
'feel balanced, be healthy, become lively!'
Phone: (02) 8065 0715 Mobile: 0466 785 820
www.livelyphysio.com.au
Ground Floor, 1394 Pacific Hwy, Turramurra NSW 2074 Australia

Virus scanning is recommended and is the responsibility of the recipient.

Great.

Sorry one last thing, what is the last answer box for? Where do you recommend putting the new patient forms on our website?

And the alert isn't showing properly? Still loading? I have attached the screen shot.

Thank you for your prompt responses.

Regards,
Sylvia

Hi Sylvia, 

I have cleared the cache, can you please try again? 

We have also updated the home page message and yes, the submissions will now be sent to admin@livelyphysio.com.au

Hi Heath,

That link above still looks same. No extra answer box and doesn't say suburb?

Once filled out, does a copy get sent to my work email address? Admin@livelyphysio.com.au

Could you put it in Contacts? What is your suggestion?

Also could you change the alert on the home page to say

We are open again! PEP/SP classes are back, mat pilates will continue online indefinitely. Read more about our COVID-19 precautions.

Thank you Heath

Regards,
Sylvia

Hi Sylvia, 

Sure, confirming we have updated those fields for you:
https://www.livelyphysio.com.au/new-patient/

The page is live yes, however it's not in the menu as yet. So the only way you can find it is by going directly to the link above. Let us know if and where you would like it linked from.

Hi Heath,

Is this live yet?

Just looking at it, I have attached a screen shot. We need another answer box post code. Can you change the wording from City or Suburb?

Regards,
Sylvia

Hi Sylvia, 

Hope all is well. We have created the new patient form on your site. 

Here's the link: https://www.livelyphysio.com.au/new-patient/

Let us know if you would like further changes.
